name: Mayonnaise
keywords: egg yolks, lemon juice, olive oil, raw
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground white pepper to taste
1 cup vegetable or olive oil or a blend of both

recipeInstructions.text: Place the yolk in a mixing bowl and add salt, pepper, mustard, lemon juice and vinegar. Beat vigorously with a wire whisk or electric beater.
Start adding the oil gradually, beating and adding oil until all is used. Taste for seasoning.
If mayonnaise is not used immediately, beat in a tablespoon of water. This will help stabilize it and slow its breaking when stored in the refrigerator.
